mapper.sql: goods_num goodsNum, goods_name goodsName, goods_price goodsPrice, goods_content goodsContent, delivery_cost deliveryCost, goods_images goodsImages, goods_main goodsMain, goods_original goodsOriginal, goods_main_org goodsMainOrg, visit_count visitCount
mapper.insert:
insert into goods(goods_num, goods_name, goods_price, goods_content, delivery_cost, visit_count,
goods_main,
goods_images,
goods_original,
goods_main_org
) values(#{goodsNum},#{goodsName},#{goodsPrice},#{goodsContent},#{deliveryCost}, 0,
#{goodsMain},
#{goodsImages},
#{goodsOriginal},
#{goodsMainOrg}
)
mapper.select: select from goods where goods_name like '%'||#{goodsWord}||'%' or goods_content like '%'||#{goodsWord}||'%'
mapper.update: merge into wish w using (select goods_num from goods where goods_num = #{goodsNum}) g on (w.goods_num = g.goods_num and w.member_num = #{memberNum}) when matched then update set wish_date = sysdate delete where w.goods_num = #{goodsNum} and w.member_num = #{memberNum} when not matched then insert (w.goods_num, w.member_num, w.wish_date) values(#{goodsNum}, #{memberNum}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from wish where goods_num = #{goodsNum} and member_num = #{memberNum}
mapper.insert: merge into cart w using (select goods_num from goods where goods_num = #{goodsNum}) g on (w.goods_num = g.goods_num and w.member_num = #{memberNum}) when matched then update set w.cart_qty = w.cart_qty + #{cartQty} when not matched then insert(w.member_num, w.goods_num, w.cart_qty) values(#{memberNum}, #{goodsNum}, #{cartQty})
mapper.select: select from goods where goods_name like '%'||#{goodsName}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into goods_ipgo(ipgo_date, goods_num, ipgo_qty, made_date) values(#{ipgoDate}, #{goodsNum}, #{ipgoQty}, #{madeDate})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, ipgo_date ipgoDate, goods_num goodsNum, ipgo_qty ipgoQty, made_date madeDate from goods_ipgo order by goods_num desc, ipgo_date desc) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.delete: delete from goods_ipgo where goods_num = #{goodsNum} and ipgo_date = #{ipgoDate}
